          <title>
            <string language="en">Burning fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennende Kraftstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carburants brûlants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combustíveis ardentes</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that we can get energy by burning fuels.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß wir Energie erhalten 
können, indem wir Kraftstoffe brennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que nous pouvons obtenir
l'énergie en brûlant des carburants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que nós podemos 
começar a energia queimando combustíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che possiamo ottenere
l'energia bruciando i combustibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que podemos conseguir 
energía quemándose los combustibles.</string>
